title: Now that I think about it, these new plants could be great for world building.
body:
These plants give us a look into not just the flora of Runeterra, but the possibilities to how they are used. 

Take a look at Honeyfruit. Already we can see a fruit that's probably a common ingredient for pies, juice, and other things you can make with fruits that I don't know because I'm lacking in this area of knowledge. 

Then we have blast cones, which could be weapinized or be the basis of early hand held explosives in Runeterra!  

Not sure what Scryer's bloom could be used for, but I'm sure it has potential!
